text: The Best Things in Life Are Free is a 1956 American biographical musical movie directed by Michael Curtiz and starring Gordon MacRae, Dan Dailey, Ernest Borgnine, Sheree North, Tommy Noonan, Larry Keating, Phyllis Avery, Byron Palmer. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1957. ==Other websites== * Category:1950s biographical movies Category:1956 musical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: The Best Things in Life Are Free (movie)
